!Priestess Glyvka: When the Giants rebelled against the goddess, they captured Cruma and imprisoned it in order to experiment on it. Bound with massive steel chains, the Cruma could only move across a very limited area. Over time, it wore down the earth in that spot and water seeped in, resulting in the marshlands visible today. [Quest _134_TempleMissionary glyvka_q0134_06.htm|"What am I supposed to do?"]
